body_html:
Thx for the replies. Although they explain what is happening, they do not provide me with a solution to my problem.
What I am trying to do is to sample repeatedly from a model I trained and to compute, for example, the average of the individual results. For simplicity and maybe efficiency in my code, I thought it might be possible to avoid doing a '[sess.run(x) for _ in xrange(4)]' call, which is what I have been doing so far.

body:
Thx for the replies. Although they explain what is happening, they do not provide me with a solution to my problem.  
What I am trying to do is to sample repeatedly from a model I trained and to compute, for example, the average of the individual results. For simplicity and maybe efficiency in my code, I thought it might be possible to avoid doing a '[sess.run(x) for _ in xrange(4)]' call, which is what I have been doing so far.
